page.title: Loan Business Lifts Wells Fargo Profit
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Wells Fargo Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WFC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WFC.N</A>, the No. 4 U.S. bank, on Tuesday said third-quarter profit rose, helped by loan growth.
